definition.syntax: string sec('cleanOutPutString', array(string 'var' => $var [, int 'maxLen' => $maxLen, int 'nohtml' => $nohtml, int 'noreturn' => $noreturn]))
definition.desc: Cleans a desired string, allowing the possibility to eliminate newline and carriage return characters, replacing HTML special characters to entities or adjusting the string to a given length.

params.name: maxLen
params.desc: If set, limits the length of the string to the specified value.

params.name: nohtml
params.desc: If set, converts the special characters to HTML entities.

params.name: noreturn
params.desc: If set, eliminates all carriage return and newline characters.

definition.return: Returns the string with the specified clean methods applied.
